title: Development and utility of a SARS-CoV-2 pseudovirus assay for compound screening and antibody neutralization assays
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Aaron A. Manu, Irene A. Owusu, Fatima O. Oyawoye, Sylvester Languon, Ibrahim Anna Barikisu, Sylvia Tawiah-Eshun, Osbourne Quaye, Kwaku Jacob Donkor, Lily Paemka, Gloria A. Amegatcher, Prince M.D. Denyoh, Daniel Oduro-Mensah, Gordon A. Awandare, Peter K. Quashie
